name: Blood Mage Arena
description:
Face the strange hoards that come to challenge the bloodmage. Survive using your blood magic, upgrade your arsenal of wands and spells, and visit the shop keep between the rounds. 

Features

-4  Enemy types 

- 4 Unique wands to slot your spells

-5 Different spells to utilize

-Shop with randomized item choices

-Local leader board

-Developed by 

Peter Bedrick

Cody Cook

Ben Bauer
